Author: itsmerighthere
Text: I hate that my husband knows. In my case it was impossible to hide it so he’s known from the beginning. But our arguments about my not eating and binging/purging really upset me. It drives a wedge when I’m lectured about it. I’m an adult and I don’t need monitoring like that. So keep it to yourself if possible, because it’s not worth it!   Unless you do want help. I don’t and have never wanted it, but that’s an individual choice.
